response.original_title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
response.overview: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone is a 2020 recut of the 1990 American epic gangster film The Godfather Part III produced and directed by Francis Ford Coppola from the screenplay co-written with Mario Puzo.
response.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
